name: Turbo Addons Elementor
author: Turbo Addons

sections.installation:
1. Download the Plugin:

    • Download the turbo-addons-elementor.zip file from the https://wordpress.org/plugins/turbo-addons-elementor/ or the WordPress plugin repository.

  2. Upload the Plugin:

    • Go to your WordPress admin dashboard.
    • Navigate to Plugins > Add New.
    • Click Upload Plugin and choose the turbo-addons-elementor.zip file you downloaded.

  3. Activate the Plugin:

    • After the installation is complete, click Activate to enable the plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Added 6 new widgets:
    1. Icon Button
    2. Section Divider
    3. Social Bar
    4. Most Top Bar
    5. Review Star
    6. Count Down Timer

1.0.0

  • Initial release with 6 advanced widgets for Elementor.
sections.description:
Turbo Addons Elementor Turbo Addons Elementor is a powerful collection of advanced widgets for Elementor, a popular WordPress page builder.

Features

Turbo Addons Elementor includes the following widgets:

  1. Pricing Table – Switch between monthly and yearly pricing with toggles and highlight the most popular plans.
  2. Animated Text Effects – Multiple text animation styles and dynamic content integration.
  3. Contact Info – Website Contact info.
  4. Heading – Design Section Heading paragram heading.
  5. Popular Post – Popular Post widget gives a list of all posts in any section where needed.
  6. Preview Card – This card allows users to add an image, heading, text, and button.
  7. Icon Button – Create buttons with customizable icons.
  8. Section Divider – Add stylish dividers between sections.
  9. Social Bar – Display social media icons for easy access.
  10. Most Top Bar – Add an info bar at the top of the page with contact details, offers, etc.
  11. Review Star – Add customizable star ratings for reviews.
  12. Count Down Timer – Display a countdown timer for events or offers.

Usage

  1. Add a Widget:

    • Go to any post or page editor where Elementor is active.
    • Open the Elementor editor by clicking Edit with Elementor.
    • Find the Turbo Addons Elementor widgets under the Turbo Addons category in the Elementor widget panel.
    • Drag and drop the desired widget onto your page.

  2. Customize Widget Settings:

    • Click on the widget to open its settings panel.
    • Customize the widget’s appearance, content, and functionality as needed.

  3. Publish or Update:

    • Once you are satisfied with your page or post, click Publish or Update to save your changes.

Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

Q: Do I need Elementor Pro to use Turbo Addons Elementor?

A: No, Turbo Addons Elementor works with the free version of Elementor. However, some features may be enhanced with Elementor Pro.

Q: How do I get support for Turbo Addons Elementor?

A: For support, please visit https://turbo-addons.com/contact/ or contact us through the WordPress support forum.

Q: Can I use Turbo Addons Elementor on multiple sites?

A: Yes, Turbo Addons Elementor is licensed under GPL v2 or later, allowing you to use it on multiple sites.

License

Turbo Addons Elementor is licensed under the GNU General Public License v2 or later. See the LICENSE for more details.
